title: hariya bittare
sahitya:
hariya bittare gatiyilla mAruti maretage sADhaavilla


caraNam 1    hari olidavarige hanumana oliva hanuma oliyadire hari oliyalilla 
hari sankalpavella hanuma balla hanuma biTTudanu hari tanolla
    caraNam 2    mUravatAradi bandu mukti dArgaLella tOridanindu 
sAri janarige andu mukti sErO mArgava tOridanindu
    caraNam 3    shata kalpagaLali sadA iTa hamsa mantragaLella japisuva khyAta 
tatvEsharig-anukUlanIta guru purandra viTTalana nija dUta
